dcterms:creator: Ankush Chatterjee
Kedhar Nath Narahari
Meghana Joshi
Puneet Agrawal
dcterms:description: The EmoContext dataset is used for contextual emotion detection in text, consisting of training and development sets with 30,160 and 2,755 samples, respectively. The dataset includes three emotion classes (happy, sad, and angry) and an 'others' category.
dcterms:title: EmoContext Dataset
